com.rhizospherejs.gwt.client.renderer
Interface HasRescalable<T>

Type Parameters:
T - The models' type rendered by the RhizosphereRenderer this interface is attached to.
public interface HasRescalable<T>

Interface for RhizosphereRenderer instances to declare that their renderings can handle resizing.

Author:
battlehorse@google.com (Riccardo Govoni)

Method Summary
 boolean canRescaleTo(T model, com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Widget w, int width, int height)
          Decides whether a rendering can be resized to the requested dimensions or not.
 void rescale(T model, com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Widget w, int width, int height)
          Resizes a rendering to the requested dimensions.
 

Method Detail

canRescaleTo

boolean canRescaleTo(T model,
                     com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Widget w,
                     int width,
                     int height)
Decides whether a rendering can be resized to the requested dimensions or not.

Parameters:
model - The Rhizosphere model the rendering represents.
w - The widget that was emitted by the renderer for this rendering. It will be a com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.HTML instance if the renderer emitted a raw HTML string or DOM element.
width - The desired width after resize.
height - The desired height after resize.
Returns:
Whether the widget can be rescaled to the requested dimensions.

rescale

void rescale(T model,
             com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Widget w,
             int width,
             int height)
Resizes a rendering to the requested dimensions.

Parameters:
model - The Rhizosphere model the rendering represents.
w - The widget that was emitted by the renderer for this rendering. It will be a com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.HTML instance if the renderer emitted a raw HTML string or DOM element.
width - The desired width after resize.
height - The desired height after resize.
